description: This file contains security-related utility functions for password hashing, password verification, and JWT token creation within a backend system. It defines functions for handling cryptographic operations using passlib and jose libraries, integrating with application settings to generate secure access tokens.

methods.name: str get_password_hash(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt via passlib.

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verifies if the plaintext password matches the hashed password.

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str | int, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT token with optional expiration and extra claims, using project settings.
